utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility methods for various tasks in the program.

      • formatBusContainer

        public static void formatBusContainer(java.lang.String text,
                                      java.lang.Integer spaces,
                                      java.lang.Boolean isLastOne,
                                      java.lang.Boolean isHeader)
        Formats a bus container for display.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display in the container.
        spaces - The number of spaces for formatting.
        isLastOne - Indicates if it's the last container.
        isHeader - Indicates if it's a header container.

      • boxFormating

        Formats a box for display.
        Parameters:
        letter - The character to repeat for formatting.
        repeatedTimes - The number of times to repeat the character.

                             java.lang.Boolean isLastOne)
        Formats a message for display.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display.
        spaces - The number of spaces for formatting.
        isLastOne - Indicates if it's the last message to display.

      • updateSeatsValue

        public static void updateSeatsValue(java.lang.String filePath,
                                    java.lang.String seatCode,
                                    boolean valueToUpdate)
        Updates the value of a seat in the specified file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the file containing seat information.
        seatCode - The code of the seat to update.
        valueToUpdate - The new value for the seat.
